Acki-t umcic-a.

Acki-tt teqcict-nni!
Ackkit wakud ass-agi deg Boston.
Acku agraw-a ittwaxdem i waya, i usnerni, i ulmad, i uḥraz n teqbaylit s talɣiwin akk yemgaraden.
Acku atan da.
Acku d taqcict i telliḍ.
Acku da i yella.
Acku imdukal-is merra llan d iẓawaliyen daɣen.
Acku iεac xemsa iseggasen di Marikan.
Acku kem d taqcict.
Acku mačči d win ur yettwassnen ara.
Acku numen s Taqbaylit.
Acku ukiɣ-d deg yiwet n taluft ur walaɣ zik.
Acku ur ttidirent ara di twennaḍt anida timsal cuddent kan ar tineslemt.
Acku yemmeslay-d ɣef yiziɣer n umdan yettwanɣan.
Acmummeḥ-nni-ines ameɣbun yesban-d amek akken teḥzen imi tetteddu ad truḥ.
Acraḍ asnalɣan aseddasan, d tukksa n ubnunek i wawalen.

Anɛam, ad d-yefk ṛebbi lehna.
Anebbaḍ yegzem taceṭṭiṭ, yeldi tiqenṭert tajdiṭ i uεeddi n ikeṛyas.
Anebdad n Sami yussa-d u yebda yettsuɣu fell-as.
Anebdu d win iɛeddan.
Anebdu yesruɣay deg Japun.
Anebdu-a, temneε tmurt i tmes n tẓegwa.
Anect ara yili deg teɣzi urgaz-nni ?
Anef ad ddreɣ deg umenni, d aya i sεiɣ d lḥeqq-iw.
Anef ad ḍebbreɣ aqerru-iw.
Anef ad d-uɣaleɣ ɣur-k.
Anef dihin. Anda ?
Anef i lemwaji ad εeddint, err iman-ik ur teẓriḍ.
Anef i waman ad lḥun.
Anef i waman ad rsen.
Anef i yeqjan ad rekden.
Anef i yeqjan ad sgelfen.
Anef i yeqjan ad ssgelfen.
Anef i yinijjel ad yali, tizwal ar ad yefk meqqeṛit.
Anef-aɣ ad nerǧu ar Tubeṛ.
Anef-as ad d-isuffeɣ taɣennant-ines.
Anef-as ad iṛuḥ, ad ijeṛṛeb ddunit.
Anef-as ad iserwet akken i s-yehwa.
Anef-as ad tecbeḥ, u anef-iyi ad tt-ttuɣ.
Anef-as ad t-ixelleṣ.
Anef-as ad truḥ!
Anef-as ad t-yexdem.
Anef-as ad yehder.
Anef-as akken, ur t-ttmasi ara.
Anef-as ard yekfu, temleḍ-as anida i yecceḍ.
Anef-as ɣur-ek!
Anef-as ɣuṛ-k!
Anef-as i tadimt ad tɣumm.
Anef-as i Tom ad ixdem axeddim-is.
Anef-as i tuzyint Ad teffeɣ i tkuzint, Anef-as i tin yebɣan takuzint ad texdem ccɣel-is.
Anef-as i yilel ad yeṭṭes.
Anef-as kan i tinna.
Anef-as kan, d ccɣel-iw.
Anef-as win-a d afɣul.
Anef-as yeččuṛ wul-is.
Anef-asen i waman ad rsen.
Anef-iyi ad ak-d-sekneɣ yiwet n tɣawsa.
Anef-iyi ad d-sfehmeɣ.
Anef-iyi ad ffɣeɣ!
Anef-iyi ad ḥeḍeɣ.
Anef-iyi ad issineɣ.
Anef-iyi ad ṛuḥeɣ.

Anef-iyi ad sirdeɣ leqlul.
Anef-iyi ad t-xedmeɣ akken sneɣ.
Anef-iyi ad waliɣ ayen i turiḍ.
Anef-iyi ad xelṣeɣ.
Anef-iyi ad εerḍeɣ.
Anef-iyi ṭṛankil!
Anef-iyi tṛankil.
Anef-sent kan ad rsent.
Aneft-iyi ad meteɣ.
Aneggaru-nni iwumi mliɣ tikti-w, iɣill-iyi mxelleɣ.
Aneɣlaf-nneɣ d amečč-imɣi, d arnaflas.
Aneɣmas yesteqsay imdanen deg ubrid di Lezzayer.
Anegzum is yeqɛed, ahat maḍi tesɛa iɣisi si zik.
Anelmad amecṭuḥ deg tmurt-is i yella, imawlan-is slemden-as ad yemmeslay tameslayt n tmurt-is, tin i nhedder yal ass.
Anelmad yessefk ad iḥulfu deg uɣerbaz am wakken deg uxxam-is i yella.
Anelmad-a deg wakken d igellil ur yesɛi ara idrimen s wacu ara d-yaɣ idlisen-is.
Anelmad-a tikwal yettarra iman-is yuḍen.
Anelmad-nni yenɣ xemsa seg imidawen-is, syin yenɣa iman-is.
Anemhal n tkebbanit akka tura yettwali ayen iḍerrun di lluzin-is si sbeḥ ar tmeddit.
Anemhal uɣerbaz-nneɣ ur yesɣar ara.
Anemlay-nni tedda-d yid-s temsuɣelt.
Aneqqis n tegnawt yenna-d ad ad yili ugeffur tameddit-a, maca ur cukkeɣ ara ad twet.
Anezgum mačči tikelt i yefka tili meqqren i wayen meẓẓiyen.
Anezwi-nni arktik n Arkhangelsk ɣur-s netta amzun d ǧahennama, ma d netta i d-yekkren deg tmennaṭ-nni, yettbin-as-d am lǧennet.
Anezzeh ɣer isura d ayen yelhan.

Ayen tzerɛd ara tɣellteḍ.
Ayen ur aɣ-ineqqen ara irennu-yaɣ tazmert.
Ayen ur aɣ-ineqqen ara yessiǧhid-aɣ.
Ayen ur aɣ-nenneq ara yessiǧhid-aɣ.
Ayen ur d-tusim ara ɣer tmeɣra?
Ayen ur k-nenɣa, d lǧehd ara k-d-yernu.
Ayen ur nqeddec ikarref.
Ayen ur sɛiɣ ḥedd ?
Ayen ur tezmireḍ ara ad iyi-tefkeḍ afus n tallelt?
Ayen ur yi-tenniḍ ara belli attruḥeḍ ar Lustṛali.
Ayen xeddmen d nekkni i t-yettxellisen.
Ayen xedmeɣ bniɣ fell-as, uggadeɣ ayen ur xdimeɣ ara!
Ayen yebɣa Tom ad yexdem ayen-nni?
Ayen yebɣu yenna-t-id, ur t-ttamen ara.
Ayen yebɣu yili, d atqbaylit kan i d tutlayt-nneɣ.
Ayen yebɣun yeḍru, tibratin ad awḍent imawlan-nsent.
Ayen yebɣun yeḍru, ur ttbeddileɣ ara rray.
Ayen yebɣu-n yeḍru.
Ayen yeḍran d wayen ur neḍri.
Ayen yeḍran, yeḍra. Ulac tuɣalin ɣer deffir.
Ayen yekksen i tezdemt, yifsus.
Ayen yelhan akk sufella i d-yettas.
Ayen yelhan ikfa.
Ayen yelhan, ḥemmlen-t yemdanen.
Ayen yellan d isalayen i yellan tigliswin.
Ayen yellan deg ul-ik, ikad-d af udem-ik.
Ayen yellan di teccuyt, ad t-id-yessali uɣenǧa.
Ayen yellan di tuggi ad t-id-issali uɣenǧa.
Ayen yellan fell-as ixdem-it.
Ayen yeqqaṛ ur as-iris ara ɣef wul.
Ayen yeqquṛen, nesfelqij-it s wuglan d tuɣmas.
Ayen yeqquṛen, yessefk ad-t tefeẓẓeḍ s laɛqel s tuɣmas-ik.
Ayen yettɣimi d imuras akter n wayen ixeddem.
Ayen yettuzeglen, d ayen ur εad nemmug swaswa.
Ayen yexdem deg wayen n diri, yiwen wass kan ad d-yuɣal fell-as.
Ayen yexdem mačči akken.
Ayen yexdem umzeɣyul ad t-yaf.
Ayen yextaṛ, ad t-yexdem.
Ayen yezgel ubruri.
Ayen yufa ad t-yečč.
Ayen yufa ad t-yexdem, mačči d win iɛeddzen.
Ayen-d i d-teǧǧa Fṛansa, tkemmel-as Zzayer.
Ayen-d-tenniḍ yelha.
Ayennat-agi mačči inu.
Ayen-nniḍen akk wicqa!
Ayen-nniḍen, yal wa d ṛṛay-is.

Ayɣar ur teskleseḍ ara taɣuct-ik?

Ayɣer ddin-ik ur yettqadaṛ ara tilelli-inu?

Dda ɛacur bu yiwen uḍar, yeqqim ɣef udekkan, isenned ɣef tɛekkazt-is yerra ddaw teɣruḍt-is.
Dda ɛacur d yiwen n urgaz lɛali, meskin d aɛiban n bu yiwen n uqejjir.
Dda ɛacur iḥulfa i wul-is yettenfal seg lferḥ imi iwala tawacult-is teddukel am yiwen.
Dda ɛacur yenna ula d netta deg wul-is: Ansuf yis-kent, tin i d-tessemmamt d tin.
Dda Ḥemmu n At Yiraten, claɣem annect ila-ten!
Dda Lmulud yerẓa asalu, nekni deg-s ad neddu!
Dda Qiqi di tannumi yezga yessaḥab tabeḥlust-is.
Dda Ṛacid Allic taddart-is isem-is Tagmunt Azuz.
Dda Ṛemḍan yuɣ-d agelzim.
Dda Sliman: tigejdit n wawal.
Ddabax d addal n yigellil.
Ddabax n uḍar iga d amubrin.
Ddabax n uḍar yuɣ-d amaḍal d tirni.
Ddabex n uḍar am usɣan deg tmurt-a.
Ddabex n uḍar di tmurt-nneɣ icba ssuq n lmal.
Ddabex n uḍar yessleb lɣaci.
Ddabex-a n uḍar yemmug s tserki iṣeḥḥan.
Ddan acḥal deg yiberdan, ulin acḥal d tiɣalin.
Ddan akk yid-s axaṭer nwan iheddeṛ tidett.
Ddan d iqeffafen.
Ddan d yiqeffafen.
Ddan deg yir tikli: tissit, asebsi, akked lxalat.

Gar igenni d tmurt, d ungal i tura Dihya Lwiz. Talwit i yiɣsan-is.
Gar ilugan n tjerrumt tacinwat d tin n tṭalyant yella umgirred ameqqran.
Gar imudar yettḥussun, llan imdanen d iɣersiwen.
Gar leḥbab beddeɣ am lexyal.
Gar snat tmenza, Zwina d Dehbiya, xtir tin i m-yehwan, taɣeḍ-tt i Caɛban-nwen.
Gar snat-nni n teqsiḍin, d tis snat-nni i ifazen.
Gar tlata-nni igerdan, d netta i imeẓẓiyen akk, i d-ijebbden lwelha.
Gar ungulen a akk, d wa i smenyifeɣ.
Gar wallen-iw yekker uɣebbaṛ.
Gar wayen yelhan di tudert d cwiṭ n tseddarit.
Gar wungalen akk i ɣriɣ, smenyafeɣ ungal Madrus n Murad Irnaten.
Gar yesɣunen ixeddmen ad naf: ameclux, tazevget, axelxal, timengucin, azrar, taxatemt, taεeṣṣavt, avzim, atg.
Gar yifrax ad yessefru, ad s-d-ɣlin imeslayen.

Ɣas ad yili kra yewεer i tigin, yessefk d lewεara-nni-ines ara k-yeǧǧen ad t-tgeḍ.
Ɣas aḍar yewweḍ aẓekka, asirem, ur yeǧǧi allaɣ-iw.
Ɣas akken ameɣrad mazal-it meẓẓi, baqi ismeẓrayen ceɣlen-d deg unadi ɣef amek ara yili deg tagara-s maḍi.
Ɣas akken anelmad iban-d yettḥessis i temsirt, di tilawt yella ineṭṭeḥ allen-is deg ssqef.
Ɣas akken d asemmiḍ, ur yecεil ara times.
Ɣas akken llan d igduden at tɣerma, ur ṭṭifen ara sdat icenga i d-iddehmen: ttwaqelεen!
Ɣas akken mačči d tutlayin-nsen maɛna s tigzi i sɛan ssawḍen ad tent-issinen tikwal xir n waɛraben neɣ n yifransisen.
Ɣas akken s tefransist i hedreɣ, ur yi-d-fhimen ara.
Ɣas akken tecmet yella win i tt-iḥemmlen, d Akli.
Ɣas akken ula d aselmad yeẓra mačči d tutlay n yinelmaden yesɣaray maɛna yettkemmil ihedder-asen-d yis-s.
Ɣas akken ur neǧǧi kra deg uxeddim, ur d-newwi ara igmaḍ igerrzen.
Ɣas akken yeɣṛa tikwal yeshetrif kan.
Ɣas akken, semmḥen-asen i yimdanen yenɣan arraw-iw.

Ɣas ini ur sεint ara xedment.
Ɣas ldi-d allen-ik. Ẓriɣ tleεεbeḍ-tt kan tegneḍ.
Ɣas ldi-d allen-im. Ẓriɣ tleεεbeḍ-tt kan tegneḍ.
Ɣas llan lehdur ṣeḥḥan, nuggad-iten d ttmesxir.
Ɣas ma d ageffur, ad ruḥeɣ ad ɛummeɣ azekka.
Ɣas ma fkiɣ-d asteqsi ur yesɛi ara lmeɛna?
Ɣas ma ɣuzzif umecwaṛ.
Ɣas ma iberdan nnḍen.
Ɣas ma tella d tameṭṭut, tennuɣ d tudert am urgaz.
Ɣas ma tettban-d tfekka-s d tuḥqirt maca ɣur-s tazmart yessewhamen.
Ɣas ma tewwet lgerra iḍ-nni yezrin, gneɣ akken i ilaq.
Ɣas ma tikkwal ur d aɣ-d-ibedder ara umeddaḥ di teqsiḍt, acku amezruy ttarun-t wiyaḍ akken yeffeɣ fell-asen nutni.
Ɣas ma uqant teqcicin deg taddart n tewrirt, terram-d ɣur-neɣ.

Gma abesṭuḥ teṛebba-t setti.
Gma amecṭuḥ atan yettferrij tilivizyu.
Gma d aqbayli.

Gma yesteḥres akken ad iruḥ ɣer din weḥd-s.

Ma yeqḍa-d ḥedd neɣ yuɣ-d idlisen s ttawil n Internet i yeshel, acku d ayen ara ɣ-yeǧǧen ad d-naf ayen akk nuḥwaǧ yerna seg uxxam.
Ma yerbeḥ netta, awer yerbeḥ gma-s.
Ma yesseglaf uydi, yugad.
Ma yessexdem-ak-tt udebbiw deg teẓgi, xir kan ad tadreḍ ɣer lqaεa terreḍ iman-ik temmuteḍ.
Ma yesteqsa-d ḥedd, in-as ulac-it da.

Maca ayɣer?

Mi ɛeddaɣ i tawwurt, d abrid ɣer tlelli.
Mi fukeɣ asekcem n yisefka, zziɣ ar yixaddamen, sdukkleɣ-ten-id ar yiwet n tzeqqa, akken ad sen-muddeɣ asileɣ ɣef useqdec n ufecku-agi amaynut.

Mi fuṛqeɣ wid ɛzizen.
Mi hak-t-id-inan?
Mi i as-yesla Yennayer yerfa fell-as; yezzi ɣer waggur n Furar, yenna-as:
Mi i fkiɣ afus deg gma, i ẓriɣ ad dtḥaz nnuba.
Mi i izeggen wass, ffɣen-d yinelmaden seg uɣerbaz.
Mi i tt-iḥemmel, yekker yuɣ-itt.
Mi ifat yettujelkeḍ, ameḥbus yerra-d s wawal.
Mi ifukk awal d yemma-s, yekcem srid ɣer texxam-is i d-yezgan ddaw n uxxam n lwacul.
Mi ifukk ɣef tid yellan nneɣnint, yezzi ɣef tin yumren.

Tameṭṭut taqbaylit tzeṭṭ, s umata, deg yiḍ, imi imir-nni kan i testufa.
Tameṭṭut tella tettεawad teqqar tabrat-nni n mmi-s tikwal.
Tameṭṭut tessew-d aɣṛum.
Tameṭṭut tettrebbi tarwa-s ɣef lasel, nnif d lḥerma.
Tameṭṭut tjemmeε tmeṛ.
Tameṭṭut tmecceḍ aqerruy-is.
Tameṭṭut werεad teffiɣ deg yiri n wergaz-is.
Tameṭṭut-a am dheb.
Tameṭṭut-a d dheb.
Tameṭṭut-a d tamugaḍt.

Tameṭṭut-a tecba taɣzalt.

Tameṭṭut-a tettbin tesεa.
Tameṭṭut-a tettili-yi.
Tameṭṭut-a txeddem ccɣel-is s lmul.
Tameṭṭut-a ur tezwij ara.
Tameṭṭut-a, d mm ibarraren!
Tameṭṭut-agi tettemcabi ar urgaz.
Tameṭṭut-ihin tessawaḍ iqannan.
Tameṭṭut-inna n eddheb d-elfeṭṭa, mačči d bublik.
Tameṭṭut-is d tafransist.
Tameṭṭut-is d tafṛansist.
Tameṭṭut-is d taṛumit.

Tamɣart tettraǧu anta tizi ara d-ifken mmi-s.
Tamɣart twala kan lṭufan-nni amelḥan tekker tuɣ-it s tiṭ.
Tamɣart yeṭṭef-itt udfel di teẓgi, teqqur seg usemmiḍ, temmut nettat d taɣat-is.
Tamɣart-a tban d tamṛabeḍt n Yirumyen.
Tamɣart-is teqqim s idis-is, teṭṭef-as afus-is.

Tamurt n Legrig deg-s aṭas n tegzirin.
Tamurt n Leqbayel tecbeḥ nezzeh deg tefsut, ad tafeḍ ijeǧǧigen deg yal tama, s yal ini: amellal, awraɣ, azegzaw, azeggaɣ, axuxi ...atg. Ad as-tiniḍ d tafelwit n teklut.
Tamurt n Leqbayel tettwassen s ccbaḥa n ugama-s, tesdukkel tizegzewt n yilel agrakal akked yidurar εlayen am Ǧerǧer d Lbabur.
Tamurt n Leqbayel tezga-d deg tefriqt n ugafa.
Tamurt n leqbayel yettwassnen ass-a deg umaḍal.
Tamurt n Leqbayel, nnig n wayen akk i nḥemmel.
Tamurt n Leqbayel, urǧin teqbil yiwen n uɛdaw, seg zik n zik, ad tt-yeḥkem.
Tamurt n Lezzayer tezga-d deg ugafa n Tefriqt.
Tamurt n mečč-medden.
Tamurt n Nurvij tecbeḥ nezzeh. Bɣiɣ ad rzuɣ ɣur-s.
Tamurt n Spanyul.
Tamurt n yimaziɣen.

Tamurt taqbaylit tesɛa takbabt-ines.

Taqbayit d tutlayt mačči d tantala akken i nenwa zik

Taqbaylit ad tesɛu amkan-is gar tutlayin n ddunit.

Taqbaylit d tutlayt-nneɣ d tutlayt n tussna.
Taqbaylit d tutlayt-nneɣ.
Taqbaylit d yiwet n tutlayt i ifazen.

Tayi attan armi teqqenṭes, yya-w ad neṭṭfet tamcint-iḍen.
Tayi attan teččur, ad neṭṭfet kan tamcint-iḍen.
Tayi tewjed i tukksa.
Ṭayland mačči d Ṭaywan.
Tayri d aṭṭan ur nesεi ddwa.
Tayri d ddexxan d tusut, weεren ad ten-teffreḍ.
Tayri d taderɣalt.
Tayri d taɣewaɣt, ur tesɛi isuḍaf, ur tesɛi tilisa.
Tayri d talwit ifent idrimen.
Tayri d tin iǧehden, maca adrim i iǧehden fell-as.

Tazemmurt tefsa.
Tazemmurt yettwaneqcen tettaǧǧa-d aṭas n uzemmur

Tazemmurt-nni akken i ẓẓiɣ tuɣ.

Taẓɣelt-is telha.
Tazmert d agerruj n umdan, win tt-yesɛan yekseb tudert yelhan.
Tazmert tella, tagmatt ulac.
Tazmert yelhan, talwit n dima, tayri ur nettfakka, teɣzi n tudert, tumert yezgan i ssarameɣ i kečč d twacult-ik d wid akk tḥemmleḍ.

Taẓuṛi iḍul webrid-is, tudert gezzilt.

Teddem ayeddid, teffeɣ ɣer tala ad d-tagem.
Teddem cwiṭ n uɣrum, tefka-as-t i umattar i d-ibedden ɣef tewwurt.
Teddem imeṣleḥ tebda ttenneḍ tiɣerɣert armi d-yeɣli yiḍ.
Teddem tawlaft n uxxam.
Teddem-d idɣaɣen icebḥen.
Teddem-d taferkit-nni iɣef tura tabrat-is, tettel-itt ɣef ukkuẓet n tikal, tger-itt daxel n tjellabt n lkaɣeḍ teccemeɛ-itt, terra-tt daxel n yiciwi-s.
Teddem-d tiḥdert n uɣrum seg ṭṭbeq yersen ɣef udekkan, tenna-as: Amek i as-qqaren i wa a mmi ?
Teddem-d tmeṭṭut asɣar, tewwet-it.

Teddem-iten zgelli.
Teddem-itent zgelli.
Teddem-it-id.
Teddem-itt zgelli.

Tedderɣel.

Tegzam tamsirt yezrin?

Temyiḥmalem mliḥ?
Temyussanem?
Temẓi d tamelsa, d taḍfi d tudert.
Temẓi tɛadda ur d-newwi s lexbeṛ.
Temẓi, d tallit akk i icebḥen deg tudert, ur nettruẓu aqerru, ur aɣ-d-tecliɛ deg tmuɣli n wiyaḍ, ur nessaḥsab i wuguren d tlufa i aɣ-id-yezzin.
Temẓi-w sεedda-ɣ-tt di lehlak d uɣilif.
Temεen dima yerna ɣer medden merra.
Temεen, tessken-iyi-d abrid.
Temεin mliḥ.
Tena-y-as tejṛa i tgelzimt tenɣiḍ-iyi. Terra-y-as afus-iw seg-m i d yekka .

Tḥebbreḍ-as ?
Thebleḍ ɣef teqbaylit.
Thebleḍ ma tkemmleḍ axeddim deg umkan am wagi.
Thebleḍ! Muqel d acu txedmeḍ!

Theyyaḍ-d akk ayen i ilaqen: aman imuẓeɣlen, ussu, amrar yeqqnen s ajgu.
Tḥeyyreɣ mačči d kra ɣef tririt i iεeṭṭlen akk annect-a.
Thomas d amazzag isaṭṭaḍen n yillel.
Thomas yeffeɣ-it leεqel dɣa yeẓdem ɣef Pierre.
Thomas yessuccef, iεedda yelsa lqecc-is s leḥder kan akken ur d-yessakay Marie.

Ti, d yessi.
Tibaktiryin llant yal amkan.
Tibewwaḍin-a d tiferkakin.
Tibexsisin bban-t atan wtent ticṛaḍ
Tibexsisin, tikeṛmusin; armi qṛib yemmut meskin.
Tibḥirt mačči kan d cclaḍa.
Tibḥirt tuḥwaǧ win ara tt-ineqcen i wakken ad d-tefk lɣella
Tibḥirt-ines d leqdic n tẓuṛi.
Tibḥirt-iw d tamecṭuḥt.
Tibiqest tettttaked ibiqas d iẓidanen.
Tibiqest tettttaked ibiqes d aẓidan.
Tibratin-a n yimawlan n Sami.
Tibwaḍin n lmusiqa tatrarin qebblent ula d tisura USB tura.
Ticcuṭna tugar tuccḍa, ladɣa ma tezga.
Ticcuṭna tugar tuccḍa.
Ticenfirin-im ttirqqaqin ttileggaɣin.
Ticki ad ssizdgeɣ tanwalt.
Ticki amasay n tiɣin yessentem tafaturt n tiɣin i as-d-yuzen usaǧǧaw, ayagi ad yessirew taceqquft n tsiḍent icudden ar tiɣin.
Ticki ar ad azzleɣ, tetteccef-iyi-d tidi.
Ticki ara fakkeɣ, ad ffɣeɣ.
Ticki iẓẓan-ik d iberkanen, xas ddu ad t-waliḍ ṭbib.
Ticki llan idammen deg yibeccan-ik, azzel ar twaliḍ amejjay.
Ticki ttazzaleɣ, seɛɛuɣ tidi.
Ticki ttazzaleɣ, tetteccef-iyi-d tidi.
Ticki tewweḍeḍ kan, siwel-iyi-d.
Ticki tsiɣ yemma times, tesrusuy inyen ɣef lkanun, sakin ad tessert tuggict.
Ticki, ad yili yemmut.
Ticraḍ s idammen.
Ticṛaḍ s idammen.
Ticulliḍin n plastik ččant ddunit.
Tid ur nečči ara seksu-yagi d timeɣbunin.
Tiddukkla tadelsant Adrar n Fad tqeddec i yidles aqbayli akken iwata.
Tidet am yiṭij, win i tt-iqerben aṭas ad ireɣ.
Tidet ara d-yini yiwen s nneyya ur neṣfi, tɣellab akk tikerkas i nezmer ad d-nesnulfu.
Tidet d gma William ayenni, Bill is neqqar.

Tom, Mary, John akked Alice lulen deg 20 Tubeṛ 2013.
Tom, tagi d Mary.
Tom, yas ass, yettawi arraw-is ɣer uɣerbaz.
Tomas yettferrij asaru.
Tomi d Mari ttemyarun dima.

Tzewǧemt deg tmurt?

Tzewṛeḍ g tyita n ssnitra.
Tzewṛeḍ g tyita n ugiṭaṛ.

Tẓewreḍ mliḥ.

Tzewṛemt mliḥ!
Tzrmreḍ ad d-taɣeḍ, ad teɣreḍ tawsit n udlis i ak-yehwan melmi i ak-yehwa.
Tzrmreḍ ad d-taɣeḍ, ad teɣreḍ tawsit n udlis i am-yehwan melmi i am-yehwa.
Tẓur-d aɛessas.
Tzureḍ cwiṭ.
Tzuxx aṭas s mmi-s.
Tεawed tekker lgirra ɣef lqaε gar Fransa d Legliz.
Tεawen baba-s deg tebḥirt.
Tεawen-it ad yeg takrabaṭ-is acku ur yessin ara.
Tεawneḍ-iyi ad ssaliɣ apyanu-nni armi d annag wis tesεa.
Tεecqeḍ yakan?
Tεedda deg tsaεet i kkiɣ ttnadiɣ fell-asent.
Tεedda-d terbaεt n yiqjan.
Tεedda-d yiwet n tkeṛṛust i tallast.
Tεeddaḍ-d yakan deg tilivizyu?
Tεeǧbeḍ-yi.
Tεelmeḍ acḥal i yi-d-tekker tkeṛṛust-a?
Tεelmeḍ amek i d-tenna?
Tεelmeḍ anta tizlit i bɣiɣ ad d-cnuɣ.
Tεelmeḍ ur zmireɣ ara.
Tεemmeḍ ad tɣelṭeḍ, neɣ xaṭi?
Tεerḍeḍ ayaziḍ-nni?
Tεerḍeḍ yakan ad tḥesbeḍ itran?

Tεerḍeḍ yiwen seg wiyi?
Tεeṭṭel tmacint ɣef ssebba n wedfel.
Tεeṭṭleḍ iḍelli.

U d acu i txeddmeḍ?
U d acu i txeddmem?
U d acu i txeddmemt?
U mazal ad nehḍeṛ s teqbaylit ala ma tefna ddunit!
U mazal ad nili s teqbaylit ala ma tefna leɛmeṛ!
U yerna, ula d nekwni d iɣeṛṣiwen!
U yiwet n tqahwiḍt s uyefki ar tis snat-inna, yiwet!
Uccen d bu txidas.
Uccen yečča tixsi.
Učči aqbayli bnin.
Učči d taẓuṛi.
Učči ḥawla yessaḍan.
Učči semmeḍ.
Učči yid-k d afelleq.
Učči yid-m d afelleq.
Učči-inem bnin maca meṛṛiɣ.
Učči-nni ẓzayen yesneqlaε-d ul umuḍin.
Učči-ya yettriḥ deg-s rekku.
Učči-ya yeεfen.
Udad ɣur-s acciwen d imeqqranen.
Uḍan ɣezzifit, ussan wezzilit deg tegrest.
Udem n Nna Mennun yebda yettbeddil ini seg wakken texleɛ uqbel ad as-d-alsen d acu yeḍran yid-sen.
Udem ubxiṣ.
Udem-agi, ssneɣ-t!
Udem-ihin, ssneɣ-t!
Udem-ik yettuɣal d azeggaɣ.
Udem-ik yumes dima.
Udem-im yettuɣal d azeggaɣ.
Udem-im yezga ger wallen-iw.
Udem-im yezga yecmumeḥ, xas tuḍenḍ neɣ tesɛiḍ aɣbel, cubaɣ-kem ɣer tjeǧǧigt yefsan, i d-yettakken rriḥa yelhan.
Udem-is am tin yarfan.
Udem-is d awraɣ.
Udem-is merra yuɣal d azewwaɣ mi yenneḥcam.
Udem-is teccef-it-id akk tidi.
Udem-is tikkwal yeḍṣa, tikkwal yennuɣna.
Udem-is yeččur akk d tidi.
Udem-is yezga yecmumeḥ.
Udem-is yezga yeslalay-it-id wallaɣ-iw yal mi ara waliɣ tawlaft-is.
Udem-nkent yettuɣal d azeggaɣ.
Udem-nwen yettuɣal d azeggaɣ.
Udi yettmagga s uyefki n tfunast.
Udmawen-nsen akk yecreh ladɣa win n Cabḥa d win n temɣart-is i yettamnen aṭas s lecyux.
Uḍneɣ iḍelli.
Uḍneɣ, qqimeɣ deg uxxam kra yekka wass.
Uḍnen ajeǧǧiḍ, rewlet fella-sen.
Uḍnent, ṭṭfent usu.
Udreɣ-d seg Tezmalt, ɛeddeɣ-d Aqbu akked Iɣzeṛ Ameqqran, sakin rziɣ ar Sidi ɛic, dɣa wwḍeɣ ar Leqseṛ.
Udren tiseddaṛin.
Udrent tiseddaṛin.
Ufan akk iman-nsen.
Ufan anejmuɛ yebda yakan.
Ufan ayen akken i asen-iruḥen?
Ufan idrimen-nni ittwakren.
Ufan iman-nsen yid-i?
Ufan iman-nsen yid-neɣ?
Ufan iman-nsen yid-nteɣ?
Ufan iman-nsen yid-s?
Ufan iman-nsen yid-sen?
Ufan iman-nsen yid-sent?
Ufan kra iqariden akken iselgen sdaxel uẓekka-nni imedreg.

Ul asget-is d ulawen.
Ul d tasa d igmanen ixataṛen n tfekka n wemdan.
Ul ičča ani, iruḥ taεebbuṭ-is tefreɣ

Ula ad agejdur atleqmen.
Ula akken d asaḍ i yella, mačči d win yettzuxxun.
Ula ara xedmeɣ s waya.
Ula d aferṭeṭṭu icebḥen, yella d tawekkiwt.
Ula d akufi yeɣli.
Ula d asafu yettnus ma ur nelli ad-t nesduqqus.
Ula d asafu yettnus, ma ur nelli ad-t nesduqqus.
Ula d asuɣu ur yezmir ad t-id-iger imi ula d awal iruḥ-as.

Wicqa ma yenza am keri.
Wid akk yellan deg tkeṛṛust nnan-d bɣan ad ffɣen ad ḍelqen acemma iḍarren-nsen.
Wid ara d-teǧǧeḍ ad ṭṭfen tiwwura icenga, dɣa iɣlanen akk n ddunit ad ttubarken s tzerriεt-ik, acku tuɣeḍ awal-iw.
Wid i d-irezzfen anṣuf yisen.
Wid i d-yeslan i usefru i d-ssawleɣ, tezɣeb akk tfekka-nsen.
Wid i izemren ttawin-d dima ayen i bɣan.
Wid i kem-itettun.
Wid ifaqen ṛuḥen!
Wid ifehmen ṛuḥen gran-d iqezlalluḥen.
Wid iɣaben dima ḍelmen.
Wid iḥemmelen taqbaylit, ar dagi ar ad asen!
Wid iḥemmelen taqbaylit, aten-aya ad asen!
Wid iqedcen ssawaḍen-d ayen i ilaqen i yinebgawen n tegnit, am seksu, lmerqa d yifettiten n uksum.
Wid iregglen iberdan ur ttawḍen sani.
Wid iwalan neɣ slan ad inin d acu yeḍran.
Wid izedɣen aẓaɣar s leqder d ameqqran i ttmuqulen adrar εalyen.
Wid izedɣen deg ixxamen n jjaj ur sen-ilaq ara ad kkaten s iblaḍen.
Wid n ṣṣeḥra d wid n lebḥer.
Wid s tidet snulfuyen-d amezruy d igduden.
Wid tt-id-yeḥyan mmuten.
Wid t-yenɣan mazal-iten d ilelliyen.
Wid ur nebɣi ad ruḥen, ur tent-terri ara tmara.
Wid ur nečči ara seksu-yagi d imeɣban.
Wid ur neɣsib, leḥḥun ɣer tama tayeffust n yisefkal.
Wid ur nettkeyyif ara, ass-nni keyyfen mebla cceḥḥa.
Wid ur nxeddem ur ttafen ara ččen.
Wid yefkan aɛrur i lbext-nsen, ad uɣalen ad mmlen!
Wid yeḥnuccḍen di Ǧerǧer.
Wid yellan akk deg texxamt-nni llan myussanen.
Wid yellan ttheggin tifranin sufɣen-d agemmuḍ i asen-yehwan.
Wid yemmuten ur d-ḥekkun tiqsiḍin.
Wid yerẓan asalu.
Wid yesɛan tikta, ulac ɣur-sen adrim; wid yesɛan adrim, ulac ɣur-sen tikta.
Wid yettaken aṭas n lweqt i usikel, ɣer tagara ttuɣalen d iɣriben deg tmurt-nsen.
Wid yettandin i imerga, sexdamen tikeččawin neɣ ibeṛṛiqen d asečči
Wid yettcaxen di lawan-nni ɣullen Yidir d wid yellan am netta, ur ten-seɣren ara deg tutlayt-sen, seɣren-ten deg tutlayin tiberraniyin ɣef ugdud n tmurt.
Wid yetteḥnuccuḍen di Ǧerǧer.
wid yettemsenṣalen yal ass di taddart.
Wid yeṭṭfen tamurt s yiɣil ad snegren aẓaṛ-is.
Wid yettmeslayen s ddin ttɣuṛṛun yal ass!
Wid yettmeslayen taspirantit ssikilen aṭas ɣer tmura n berra.
Wid yettseddiqen, iḥemmel-iten Ṛebbi.
Wid yettwaḥemmlen sɣur aṭas n medden ttmettaten s shala d ilmeẓyen.
Wid yezzenzen aqenduṛ-nsen, haten baten!
Wid yi-d-yuznen ifayluten, ad asen-iniɣ tanemmirt.
widak akk yettḥawalen aqeṛḥan sɛan ccin
Widak ɣilen yelha leqdic-nsen.
Widak i teffɣen abrid.
Widak yellan din aṭas ur negzi azal n leqdic nneɣ.
Widen yebɣan ad bḍun yid-k tiflas-nsen timasɣanin, ɣas ini-as werǧin beqqun ad tebḍuḍ yid-sen ayla-k.
Wiɣ abrid n tsedawit
Wigi d aɣerbaz n zzayer i ten-iseɣren, i isserfen fell-asen, maca d timura tiberraniyin i yesfaydin deg-sen, am Fransa, kanada, Marikan atg…
Wigi d atmaten inselmen yebnan tudert-nsen ɣef tikta timṭerfin.
Wigi d yir imdanen.
Wigi i yettkellixen s ddin d udmawen n lɛaṛ!
Wigi ineqqen tura ufraren-d.
Wigi ttuɣaḍen msakit.
Wigi yellan deg umadaɣ ttidiren am uccanen.
Wihin akka i d-iteddun ɣur-i d alebɛaḍ maɛna mačči d kečč.
Wihin akkin d umliḥ s tidet.
Wihin d argaz n Mary.
Wihin saɣel imelleḥ dayen kan.

Xaqeɣ fell-ak a baba!
Xaqeɣ fell-ak aṭas.
Xaqeɣ fell-ak s tidet.
XaqeƔ fellak.
Xaqeɣ fell-ak.
Xaqeɣ fell-akent aṭas.
Xaqeɣ fell-akent.
Xaqeɣ fell-am aṭas.
XaqeƔ fellam.
Xaqeɣ fell-am.
Xaqeɣ fell-as.
Xaqeɣ fell-awen aṭas.
Xaqeɣ fell-awen.
Xaqeɣ maḍi kan fell-am.
Xaqeɣ mliḥ ɣef yemma.
Xaqeɣ mliḥ ɣef yimawlan-iw.
Xas a d neṭṭef izem seg ufus, ad as-inin d axennus.
Xas a d neṭṭef izem seg ufus, ad as-nini d axennus.
Xas abrid yessawen, nettaf lebɣi deg tikli.
Xas akka beɛdeɣ fell-am.
Xas akken d imgaǧi, mazal-it yeṭṭef yetturar amundul.
Xas akken d-atmaten aɛebbuḍ yebḍa-ten.
Xas akken iḥemmel tamurt-is, terra-t tmara ad yinig ar tmura n medden.
Xas akken tella teplakt yemmalen talast n tmanyin n yikilumitren, isenhaṛen ttazzalen, dɣa yesḥebsiten-id umsaltu, yernu yekkes-asen lekwaɣeḍ.
Xas akken texseṛ tegnawt, Tom iteẓẓu lekremb.
Xas akken Ṭum ur t-yeḥmil ara maca yewɣa-t-id.
Xas akken yettidir di tmurt n Fransa gar iṛumyen, maca ur yettu yara taqbaylit-is id-yeṭṭeḍ deg yidmaren n yemma-s.
Xas akken, aṭas i d-yeqqimen seg wass-n ar ass-a.
Xas akken, umneɣ-k.
Xas ayefki-w ur teṛwim ara, mi akken i yi-ken-kksen deg yirebbi.
Xas ɛeddan yiseggasen, allaɣ yugi ad yettu ass-nni amcum, yeǧǧa-d deg wul ccama tameqqrant, ur yezmir zzman ad yesfeḍ!
Xas ɛeddan yiseggasen, mazal-ik deg wallaɣen; xas ad ɛeddin yiseggasen, d awezɣi ad teffɣeḍ ulawen!
Xas gersen yiḥulfan-nneɣ deg tegrest, ad uɣalen ad ḥmun deg unebdu.
Xas iɣder-ik zzman, xas ifadden-ik εyan, eǧǧ ul-ik d aleqqaq, d azeddgan, sɛu iles aẓidan, zmumeg i wid i ak-id-yezzin.

Zik qqaren: Win iḥemmlen tamaziɣt, yissin tira-s . Tura qqareɣ-as: Win iḥemmlen tamaziɣt yeldi ablug .

Ẓẓay fell-asen wawal.
Ẓẓay fell-asen wawal?
Ẓẓay fell-asent wawal.
Ẓẓay fell-asent wawal?
Ẓẓay fell-awen wawal.
Ẓẓay fell-awen wawal?
Ẓẓay fell-i wawal.
Ẓẓay ublaḍ-nni.
Ẓẓay uqerruy-is.
Ẓẓay usenduq-a, ur s-zmireɣ.
Ẓẓay wakud, ugint ad kfunt snat n tsaɛtin-nni.
Ẓẓay wuzzal.
Ẓẓayeḍ fell-i εecra iberdan.
Ẓẓayet fell-as s waṭas.
Ẓẓayet tbalizt-a.
Ẓẓayet tnarit-a, mačči d ayen ara d-nerfed.
Ẓẓayit igerrumen-a.
Ẓẓebra n umzil ẓẓayet nezzeh.
Ẓẓebra ẓẓayet, d uzzal.
Ẓzeg-d ayefki n tɣeṭṭen.
Zzenz ayen i m-d-yegran.
Zzenzeɣ-tt, rriɣ areṭṭal.
Zzerriεa teḥwaǧ azwu d waman akken ad d-temɣi.
Zzheṛ annect ila-t.
Ẓẓher-is yečča-t umcic, yewwi-t di tfesqa.
Zzher-iw d aɛeẓẓug, ssawleɣ-as, ur d-yesli.
Zzi ar tama tayeffust!
Zzi ar tama tazelmaḍt!
Zzi-d udem-ik!
Zzi-d xemsa iberdan i wurti.
Zziɣ ar tama tayeffust.
Ẓẓiɣ baṭaṭa di tebḥirt-nneɣ akked yemma.
Ẓẓiɣ ddeqs n tleqqamin.
Ẓẓiɣ taneqlet.
Zzin yezdeɣ Zehwa ma terna teqqen taziba.
Zzin-aɣ wuccanen deg teẓgi!
Zzin-as i umdakel-nsen, seɣlint ar tmurt.
Zzin-as-d lɣaci.
Zzin-asen-d wid i d-yusan ad ẓuren, tetten.
Zzin-d d agraw.
Zzin-d i umaḍal.
Zzint-iyi is tlata, ccrab d lḥubb d ttkyaf.
Zzit d waman ur xellḍen ara.
Zzit n Uqbu d ddwa ḥellu.
Zzit n uzemmur trennu lbenna i lqut.
Zzit n uzemmur, d ddwa.
Zzit-a tesbek.
Zziwzel-it.
Ẓẓleɣ ɣef umeṭreḥ.
Ẓẓleɣ ɣef umeṭreḥ-iw.
Ẓẓlen ɣef tgertilt.
Zzman aqdim dayen iεedda.
Zzman-agi d bu leεyub
Zzna yettuḥeṛṛem deg aṭas n ddyanat.
Zznezla tessegra-d ixessaren meqqren.
Zznezla-yi tugar akk tid nesεedda.
Zznuzun aɣrum deg tḥanut-a ?
Zznuzun aksum deg tḥanut-a.
Zzrudya deg-s ddeqs n tvitiamint A.
Ẓẓu kra n tzemrin ara d-afen warraw-ik!
Ẓẓulen akk.
Ẓẓulen meṛṛa.
Zzux d lhedra baṭel, ulac fell-as lexlaṣ.
Zzux d lmecmel, ttalasen deg-s akk leǧnas.
Zzux ur ǧǧin-ara.
Zzuzer ameslay!
Zzuzret talwit di ddunit!
Zzuzznen-aɣ armi i neṭṭes.
Zzwaǧ mačči d ayen yecqan ilmeẓyen.
Zzwaǧ yuɣal d ttjara, ccuruṭ ɛeddan tilas.
Zzwaǧ, d argaz d tmeṭṭut mi ara ddaklen..
Ẓẓεen-tent.
Ԑasset iman-iwen, ata iteddu-d utsunami.
Ԑasset iman-nwen deg iberdan!
Ԑawdeɣ ɣriɣ tabrat-nni acḥal d tikelt.
Ԑawdet-as!
Ԑawed ḥku-yi-d taqsiṭ-nni, ttxil-k.
Ԑawed ini-d anda tzedɣeḍ.
Ԑawed ini-yi-d acḥal tesεiḍ n yidrimen.
Ԑawed-as yiwen webrid!
Ԑawen-iyi ad ken-εawneɣ.
Ԑawneɣ-tt deg usired n yiqbac.
Ԑebban azaglu, yiwen ssya wayeḍ ssyihin.
Ԑebber-iyi-id.
Ԑecqen deg yiwet n teqcict.
Ԑecra imeḥbas i irewlen si lḥebs.
Ԑecra, εecrin, tlatin, rebεin, xemsin, settin, sebεin, tmanyin, tesεin, mya.
Ԑeddan ad ssrewten, ur ufin annar.
Ԑeddant snat n ssmanat ur kennt-ẓriɣ.
Ԑeddant snat n ssmanat ur kunt-ẓriɣ.
Ԑeddi kan ɣer ṣṣeḥḥ-nni a Tom! D acu tebɣiḍ? Teḥwaǧeḍ idrimen?
Ԑeddi kan ur ttagad.
Ԑeddi ma ad t-afeɣ.
Ԑeddi-d ihi ma yewwi-k-id ubrid.
Ԑeddi-d kra n wass ad teččeḍ imensi.
Ԑeǧben i iman-nsen.
Ԑeǧben-aɣ ixeddamen n rrisṭura-yi.
Ԑeǧben-aɣ mliḥ wid ixeddmen deg tneččit-a.
Ԑeǧben-ak yilwen.
Ԑeǧben-as icakan, tugart akerrembiṭ.
Ԑeǧben-iyi ibukefranen.
Ԑeǧben-iyi ifekren.
Ԑeǧben-iyi ileɣman.
Ԑeǧben-iyi mliḥ isura-nni i d-sεeddan deg tfaska n Cannes.
Ԑelli di tignaw, ɣewwes, awi-yi-d lexbar n tmurt.
Ԑelmeɣ ad tiliḍ kan tettxemmimeḍ.
Ԑelmeɣ amek isem-im.
Ԑelmeɣ anda ara ilint tameddit-a.
Ԑelmeɣ anda llan.
Ԑelmeɣ anda nezmer ad naf yiwet.
Ԑelmeɣ anda tetteffreḍ sslaḥ-im.
Ԑelmeɣ aṭas n warrac i yebɣan ad ffɣen yid-m.
Ԑelmeɣ d acu ara xedmeɣ.
Ԑelmeɣ d acu d aẓawali.
Ԑelmeɣ d acu yenna i yimdukal-is fell-i.
Ԑelmeɣ da i tellam ay iherbab!
Ԑelmeɣ iɣaḍ-ikem lḥal.
Ԑelmeɣ kan ad d-tuɣaleḍ, yeqreb neɣ iḍul.
Ԑelmeɣ kan ad yi-d-tḍelbeḍ aya.
Ԑelmeɣ kan ad yi-t-id-tessutreḍ.
Ԑelmeɣ kan ur tebɣiḍ ara ad txedmeḍ akken.
Ԑelmeɣ llan widak izemren ad t-walin.
Ԑelmeɣ tettxemmimeḍ fell-i.
Ԑelmeɣ txaqeḍ fell-asen.
Ԑelmeɣ ur tceffuḍ ara.
Ԑelmen yess-neɣ?
Ԑemmdeɣ kulci ɣef lǧal-ik.
Ԑemmdeɣ kulci ɣef lǧal-im.
Ԑemmren akamyun-nni.
Ԑemmur Ԑebdennur aseggas-a yecna-d ɣef Sidi-Ԑic, tamurt-is.
Ԑeqleɣ taɣect-a.
Ԑerḍeɣ ad aruɣ s ufus azelmaḍ.
Ԑerḍeɣ ad geɣ akken yiwet n tikelt.
Ԑerḍeɣ ad qazmeɣ.
Ԑerḍeɣ ad ṣebreɣ.
Ԑerḍeɣ amek ur ttfayiɣ.
Ԑerḍeɣ yiwwas geɣ takrebbut tabudit maca ṭṭseɣ deg tlemmast.
Ԑerḍeɣ-d imdukal-iw i imensi.
Ԑerḍen ad rewlen.
Ԑerḍen merra seg wučči.
Ԑerḍen merra tagella-nni.
Ԑerḍen-tent ɣer imensi.
Ԑeṭṭleɣ acemma mi d-wwḍeɣ.
Ԑeṭṭlen deg usikel ɣef lǧal n tmacint.
Ԑewwleɣ-d ad geɣ tawessant aseggas-a.
Ԑewwleɣ-d ad εawdeɣ ad εerḍeɣ.
Ԑǧben-iyi isura werstern.
Ԑir-iyi-imru-nni deg leεnaya-k.
Ԑiwen-iyi ad lemdeɣ tanehart.
Ԑiwen-iyi ad sizedgeɣ agaraǧ.
Ԑreḍ ad terreḍ i wayen akk iwumi tzemreḍ d tuttriwin.
Ԑreḍ amek ara tanfeḍ i yir učči.
Ԑreḍ amek ara tfarseḍ.
Ԑreḍ amek ur tesruḥayeḍ annect-nni n lweqt deg ucetki ɣef ayen ur tezmireḍ ad tbeddleḍ.
Ԑreḍ amek ur tettaḍsaḍ.
Ԑreḍ amek ur tettkeyyifeḍ ara.
Ԑreḍ amek ur tɣelliḍ deg ul-iw.
Ԑreḍ ccrab-a, teẓreḍ ma iεǧeb-ak.
Ԑreḍ ccrab-a, teẓreḍ ma iεǧeb-am.
Ԑreḍ deg leεna-yak ad d-tiniḍ ayen akka d-tenniḍ s wawalen iḥerfiyen kan akken ara izmiren imidawen-nneɣ ibeṛṛaniyen ad fehmen ugar.
Ԑreḍ kan ayen-nniḍen axir-ik.
Ԑreḍ kan ayen-nniḍen axir-im.
Ԑreḍ, wissen ahat.
Ԑuhdeɣ iman-iw ur εawdeɣ ad xedmeɣ akken.
Ԑyan iɣallen-iw.
Ԑyiɣ d leεǧeb.
Ԑyiɣ di kulci. D acu kan ara y-d-iεeǧben tura akka: d Tigzirin Tiknariyin lukan ad iliɣ din.
Ԑyiɣ i k-nedṛeɣ.
Ԑyiɣ i uḍneɣ.
Ԑyiɣ maḍi.
Ԑyiɣ seg aṭṭan.
Ԑyiɣ seg ccḍeḥ.
Ԑyiɣ seg tudert-a ur nettbeddil.
Ԑyiɣ seg usu i ṭṭfeɣ ɣef teɣzi n wass.
Ԑyiɣ seg yiẓẓan-a!
Ԑzizet fell-i.
